programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Virginia y Borre terminan su relacion y no conforme, ella decide iniciar su propio negocio de tacos veganos. Arturo se encuentra un billete de mil pesos.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Jorjáis decide invertir en un negocio de ropa de paca y descubre que no está solo, tiene competencia. Silvia y Luis buscan sobrevivir al primer día de guardería de Luisito Jr.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Karla, la sobrina de Silvia, la visita en su casa, y ella finge que tiene una actitud muy cool y se va de parranda con ella. Pedro se siente mal y no puede salir de su cuarto.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: La guardería está cerrada y Silvia y Luis no tienen quién cuide a Luisito Jr., por lo que tendrán que elegir entre los vecinos. Hipólito, Pedro y Germán buscan hacer válida la garantía de un celular.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: In a neighborhood in Mexico City, the neighbors have problems and silly misadventures with one another.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Germán convoca a una junta vecinal, pero nadie asiste porque nadie vio el anuncio en el pizarrón, Jorjais les propone hacer un grupo de chat para enterarse de los acontecimientos en el edificio.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Como es costumbre en el edificio, los vecinos no pagan la cuota del gas, y ante la negativa de todos, Luis decide poner su propio tanque estacionario ¡en la azotea!

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Luis estaciona su carro afuera de su edificio y un franelero quiere cobrarle 20 pesos por cuidar su coche. Los vecinos hacen una junta para planear quitarlos sin que haya consecuencias.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Los vecinos reciben una invitación de la delegación para separar la basura. Algo muy básico: orgánica e inorgánica, Germán es el encargado de dicha misión.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Magdalena abre una cuenta en Facebook donde presume demasiadas cosas e inclusive transmite en vivo una invitación pública para la fiesta de su nieto Morris.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Pedro se dedica a buscar mujeres por Facebook, y ante el asombro de Luis, conoce a una chica guapísima; Luis tiene curiosidad y decide aplicar la misma técnica para encontrar al amor de su vida.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvia, desesperada por conocer hombres, renta una habitación de su departamento por medio de una aplicación; un hombre apuesto renta el cuarto, ella se enamora, pero aparece la ex novia y comienzan los problemas.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Un temblor llega a la ciudad sacudiendo todos los departamentos de los vecinos. Luis les propone a los vecinos llevar a una persona de Protección civil para prepararlos ante una emergencia.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Morris está en la etapa de las dudas y pregunta a sus padres cómo conquistar al amor de su vida. Alejandra y Rocko deciden contarle una historia de amor: el relato de cómo se conocieron.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvia instala internet de alta velocidad en su departamento, sin embargo su conexión es muy lenta; lo que no sabe es que sus vecinos saben la contraseña y todos se conectan a su red.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Lorena está cansada de que Frankie no consiga trabajo y a éste se le ocurre una gran idea: poner una academia de actuación basada en el Método Rivers.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Arturo llora porque su familia es pobre y Lorena lo consuela, Germán y Pedro creen que son amantes. Magda encuentra una nota de amor y las cosas se enredan más de la cuenta.

programme.title: Sortilegio
programme.desc: Alejandro returns home after a terrible accident to discover that he is married to Maria Jose, a poor, innocent girl who was deceived by Alejandro's brother Bruno. Bruno used Alejandro's name to marry Maria Jose, soon after he sent to kill his brother in hopes that Maria Jose would inherit Alejandro's fortune. But when Maria Jose arrives at the mansion she realizes that Bruno lied to her and used her. She is also scared when Alejandro is found alive and returns home. Doctors tell Alejandro that he suffers from memory loss but he is convinced he never met Maria Jose before and goes in search of the truth, but during this time and Maria Jose actually fall in love, while Bruno and Maura (Alejandro's ex-girlfriend) plot to break them up. Meanwhile, the brothers' mother Victoria has fallen in love with Fernando--Alejandro's best friend, so closer to his age than hers.

programme.title: Ave sin nido
programme.desc: In this dramatic morality tale from Director Chano Urueto, a pretty young girl is torn between her religious faith and true love. She ultimately leaves the Convent and the nuns who cared for her, in order to marry a handsome and successful engineer. The couple's marital bliss is cut short when they find they cannot conceive children. After having an extramarital affair, the husband fathers a girl with the other woman. While hurt by his infidelity at first, this wife recovers and both soon realize that they could raise this baby as their own daughter, while allowing the biological mother to avoid the shame and stigma of having a child out of wedlock. This convenient solution seems as if it was tailor-made and heaven-sent. This mutually advantageous and seemingly harmless lie works out well through the years, as their daughter grows into a beautiful young woman in her own right. Just as she is about to marry her own true love, the poor girl finally discovers the awful truth. Consequently, she feels that she must now go live with her birth mother, especially after being lied to for so long by those who raised her. Worst of all, she is suddenly forced to come to grips with the fact that she is really an illegitimate child, born out of wedlock, as the result of an adulterous affair. As such, she now considers herself to be tainted and utterly unworthy to marry her intended, or anyone else, for that matter. The all-star cast includes Rene Cardona, David Silva and Jose Pulido.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve loves to fish as much as he loves to hunt.¬†Steve is on a river in SW Montana for a day to catch some rainbow trout and cook a few over a fire. As fishing and campfire cooking offer time for reflection, Steve takes the time to recall a few memorable MeatEater meals.¬†From caveman style sheep ribs in the Alaska Range to curiosity-induced coyote BBQ in Mexico, these meals give Steve the chance to explore what it means to be a MeatEater.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Last spring, Steve decided to pass up an opportunity to kill a black bear in favor of an extended up close and personal experience. This time, Steve heads back to his shack on Prince of Wales Island and he‚Äôs brought his friend Paul Neess from Vortex Optics along to share the experience of using a canoe to slip in close to these giant black bears.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: All across America hunters kick off the fall hunting season with a weekend of doves, friends, and food. Steve's lifelong friend, Ronny Boehme has invited Steve out to his digs in Virginia for the dove opener. To prep for opening day, Steve and Ron spend a day brushing up on their shooting skills on a sporting clays course followed by a pigeon hunt. Steve shares simple, delicious cooking methods for doves and pigeons.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Ryan Callaghan and Aaron Evans join Steve on an epic adventure in British Columbia‚Äôs Rockies to pursue grizzly bears. Steve has long desired to take a grizzly but only if he can do it in a way that fits his personal ethics. The hunt is dampened by frustrating weather but Steve finds a way to fix a tasty meal.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve is fed up with disrespect for one of the world's most unique game animals-the pronghorn antelope. Throughout the hunt, Steve shares antelope biology, hunting techniques, and meat care. Steve aims to make antelope lovers out of everyone and get pronghorns the respect they deserve.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve‚Äôs quest for a giant mule deer buck continues in central Idaho. To help Steve in his journey, Ryan Callaghan has offered up one of his best spots as well as his keen spotting skills. The duo backpack hunt in some of the West‚Äôs steepest and prettiest mountains seeking the colossal buck of Steve‚Äôs dreams. In part one, frustration and opportunities abound and Ryan turns a failed black bear stalk turns into a successful buck hunt.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve's quest for a giant mule deer buck continues in central Idaho. To help Steve in his journey, Ryan Callaghan has offered up one of his best spots as well as his keen spotting skills. The duo backpack hunt in some of the West's steepest and prettiest mountains seeking the colossal buck of Steve's dreams. In part two Steve finds the buck he's been searching for his whole life. The dream is realized and Steve and Ryan feast on a slow cooked roast.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In this Cooking Special, Steve demonstrates how to butcher a whole whitetail deer, guiding you through the steps to transform it into steaks, roasts, shanks, and more. He covers every detail, including how to utilize parts that are often discarded, making sure nothing goes to waste. Perfect for anyone looking to make the most out of their deer harvest.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Helen Cho and Brittany Brothers are back for a double episode. This time around they‚Äôre hunting whitetail deer in Wisconsin on the famed Duren farm with Doug Duren and Steve as their guides. Arriving a few days early to scout and tune up their shooting with some squirrel hunting, the ladies enter the next chapter of their hunting journey.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Helen Cho and Brittany Brothers are back for a double episode. This time around they're hunting whitetail deer in Wisconsin on the famed Duren farm with Doug Duren and Steve as their guides. In part two both Helen and Brittany get their chance at Duren farm bucks. Hobo dinners over the campfire make it deer camp.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Kevin Murphy and his band of Kentucky small game hunters introduce Steve to the finest Kentucky has to offer. Gray squirrels with tree hounds and cottontails with beagles, in Kentucky, it‚Äôs the dogs that do the hunting. Cathead biscuits, sawmill gravy, and fried small game round out the Kentucky adventure.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and Janis head into the remote mountains of Sonora, Mexico, to pursue the elusive Coues deer and javelina. Jani, a seasoned guide but a first-time hunter of this species, faces the challenge of spotting these "gray ghosts" in rugged terrain. Along the way, they explore local traditions and savor the rewards of their hunt with a traditional tatamato dish, reflecting on the value of new experiences and the thrill of firsts in hunting.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella heads to the historic beaver trapping grounds of Wyoming to explore the legacy of the mountain man era. As he sets traps along the Green River, Steve immerses himself in the methods and stories of early American trappers. Alongside his quest to catch beavers, he delves into the fascinating history of how beavers shaped the fur trade and American frontier life. It's a journey through both the rugged landscapes and the rich heritage of the American West.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and ecologist Karl Malcolm head to the Cibola National Forest, guided by a century-old tip from conservationist Aldo Leopold, to hunt Merriam's wild turkeys. Their adventure showcases the forest's rich history and the legacy of Leopold's conservation efforts while they track these elusive birds through challenging terrain.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella learns new culinary tricks from Chef Eduardo Garcia, a wild game enthusiast from Charged Film & Montana Mex. As Eduardo shares his expertise in smoking meats and preparing wild game dishes, Steve takes notes, eager to expand his culinary repertoire and bring fresh flavors to his own wild game cooking adventures.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella joins ranch manager and wildlife biologist Ben Binnion in Texas to explore the often-overlooked aspects of hog management. During the annual pig roundup, Steve learns about the ecological impact and challenges of controlling the hog population, providing a deeper understanding of the complexities of hunting and wildlife management in the Lone Star State.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella heads deep into Montana‚Äôs rugged mountains to hunt black bears, reflecting on two decades of memories in this harsh yet captivating landscape. Joined by memories of his brother and their youthful adventures, Steve navigates grizzly country, contemplates the passage of time, and explores the evolving nature of hunting. Through encounters with both bears and the terrain, Steve seeks not just game but a connection to the past and the lessons it holds.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella teams up with Joe Rogan in Nevada's high desert to bowhunt for elusive mule deer bucks. Surrounded by vast public lands and rugged terrain, they navigate the challenges of close-range stalking with their bows. With Joe's enthusiasm for archery and Steve's experience, the duo pushes their limits in pursuit of these wary deer, embracing the highs and lows of hunting in one of America's most unforgiving landscapes.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and Janis are deep in the wilderness of eastern Alaska on a challenging moose and caribou hunt. Joined by Janis' father, Papa Jani, who wants one last adventure before age catches up, they endure the highs and lows of remote hunting. With patience wearing thin and the weather turning, the group pushes through thick willows and foggy mornings, hoping for a bit of luck and a successful hunt before their journey's end.
